sentence.Network_en: Certain autosomal translocations in the heterozygous state can be fully viable.

sentence.Network_en: When the two alleles are not identical , they are said to be heterozygous.
sentence.Network_cn: 当两个等位基因不同时,称之为杂合性的.

sentence.Network_en: When the two alleles are not identical, they are heterozygous.
sentence.Network_cn: 杂合性:在一个基因位点上具有两个不同的等位基因.
